user.title: Configure Monit Integration
user.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lordmike/ha-monit. Fill out the url of your monit server, such as "http://192.168.1.10:2812/". The integration will periodically fetch the "/_status?format=xml" endpoint. If authentication has been configured, fill out the username/password for it, else leave them blank.
